<<Window.Resources> <Style BasedOn="{StaticResource MaterialDesignFloatingHintTextBox}" TargetType="{x:Type TextBox}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="2,2,2,18" /> </Style>
<Style BasedOn="{StaticResource MaterialDesignFloatingHintComboBox}" TargetType="{x:Type ComboBox}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="2,2,2,18" /> </Style>
<Style BasedOn="{StaticResource MaterialDesignRaisedButton}" TargetType="{x:Type Button}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="4" /> </Style>
<Style BasedOn="{StaticResource NumericTextBoxStyle}" TargetType="{x:Type numericTextBox:NumericTextBox}"> <Setter Property="Width" Value="60" /> <Setter Property="HasDecimals" Value="False" /> <Setter Property="Maximum" Value="65535" /> <Setter Property="Minimum" Value="0" /> </Style> </Window.Resources> <materialDesign:DialogHost CloseOnClickAway="True" IsOpen="{Binding IsDriveDialogVisible}"> <materialDesign:DialogHost.DialogContent> <views:SelectDrive DataContext="{Binding DialogViewModel}" /> </materialDesign:DialogHost.DialogContent>
<ScrollViewer HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled" VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto"> <Grid Margin="5"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<WrapPanel Grid.Row="0" Orientation="Horizontal">
<materialDesign:Card Width="350" Margin="10" Padding="10"> <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<TextBlock Text="Naam van de module" Style="{StaticResource TitleTextBlock}" Grid.Row="0"/> <TextBox Text="{Binding Settings.Name, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="1" materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="Naam" ToolTip="De naam van waarmee de module teruggevonden kan zorden in de web-app"/> </Grid> </materialDesign:Card>
<materialDesign:Card Width="350" Margin="10" Padding="10"> <StackPanel> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleTextBlock}" Text="IP-Adressen" />
<Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TextBox Grid.Column="0" materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="Rest server IP" ToolTip="Het ip-adres waarop de rest server bereikt kan worden"> <TextBox.Text> <Binding Mode="TwoWay" NotifyOnValidationError="True" Path="Settings.RestServerIP" UpdateSourceTrigger="PropertyChanged" ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" ValidatesOnExceptions="True"> <Binding.ValidationRules> <helpers:IPValidationRule ValidatesOnTargetUpdated="True" /> </Binding.ValidationRules> </Binding> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <numericTextBox:NumericTextBox Grid.Column="1" materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="Portnumber" ToolTip="Het poortnummer waarop de rest server bereikt kan worden" Value="{Binding Settings.RestServerPort, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" /> </Grid>
<Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TextBox Grid.Column="0" materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="Socket IP" ToolTip="Het ip adres van de centrale tracker module"> <TextBox.Text> <Binding Mode="TwoWay" NotifyOnValidationError="True" Path="Settings.SocketIP" UpdateSourceTrigger="PropertyChanged" ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" ValidatesOnExceptions="True"> <Binding.ValidationRules> <helpers:IPValidationRule ValidatesOnTargetUpdated="True" /> </Binding.ValidationRules> </Binding> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox>
<numericTextBox:NumericTextBox Grid.Column="1" materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="Portnumber" ToolTip="Het poortnummer waarop de service voor de centrale tracker te bereiken is" Value="{Binding Settings.SocketPort, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" /> </Grid> </StackPanel> </materialDesign:Card>
<materialDesign:Card Width="250" Margin="10" Padding="10"> <StackPanel> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleTextBlock}" Text="Wifi instellingen" />
<TextBox materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="SSID" Text="{Binding Settings.WifiSSID, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" ToolTip="Het SSID waarmee de kiosk moet verbinden om aan de rest/socket server te kunnen" /> <TextBox materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="WPA/PSK" Text="{Binding Settings.WifiWPA, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" ToolTip="De WPA/PSK key om verbinding te kunnen maken met het netwerk" /> </StackPanel> </materialDesign:Card>
<materialDesign:Card Width="350" Margin="10" Padding="10"> <StackPanel> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleTextBlock}" Text="Kiosk" /> <ComboBox materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="Kiosk type" IsEditable="False" ItemsSource="{Binding PossibleKioskTypes}" SelectedItem="{Binding Settings.KioskType, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" ToolTip="Het type van de kiosk" /> <numericTextBox:NumericTextBox Width="300" materialDesign:HintAssist.Hint="Snelheid van de slides" HasDecimals="True" ToolTip="De snelheid van de foto's in de foto-slideshow" Value="{Binding Settings.TimePerSlide, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" />
<colorPicker:ColorPicker Width="300" Height="250" SelectedColor="{Binding Settings.BackgroundColorAsColor}" /> </StackPanel> </materialDesign:Card> </WrapPanel>
<WrapPanel Grid.Row="1" Orientation="Horizontal"> <WrapPanel HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Command="{Binding OpenCommand}" Content="Openen" ToolTip="Een opgeslagen instelling laden" /> <Button Command="{Binding SaveCommand}" Content="Opslaan" ToolTip="Een instelling opslaan" /> </WrapPanel> <WrapPanel HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Command="{Binding ImportCommand}" Content="Importeren" ToolTip="Een instelling importeren van een Pi" /> <Button Command="{Binding ExportCommand}" Content="Exporteren" ToolTip="Een instelling exporteren naar een Pi" /> </WrapPanel> </WrapPanel> </Grid> </ScrollViewer> </materialDesign:DialogHost>.../>
